data.label:
Narrator

I had never seen this room accommodate people who are not part of the council before. Today, it was packed with military staff -- every single top-ranking general and admiral in Rizia was in attendance.

Narrator

I arrived at the Council Chambers to discuss the war plans with the highest ranking members of the Rizian military.

Narrator

They were standing over a massive table, arranging golden and silver tokens atop a map of Pales.

Player_Romus_Italic

I nodded in approval.

Nod.

Player_Romus

"Yes. What are we even waiting for?"

Lucita Azaro

"Your Majesty, our forces are already mobilized. Our navy and air forces are prepared and are awaiting for your orders. And our ground forces will be ready to cross the border within 48 hours."

Player_Romus

"And what is our intelligence on Palesian defenses?"

Lucita Azaro

"Our intelligence suggests Pales may not be completely prepared for an immediate incursion. We have the element of surprise, which we should capitalize on."

Lucita Azaro

"Our intelligence suggests Pales is expecting an immediate incursion."

Lucita Azaro

"And, they have been strengthening their northern borders with us -- building forts and bunkers along River Alca."

Lucita Azaro

"Speed is of the essence. We must overwhelm Palesian soldiers before they can fully organize."

Player_Romus

"Okay. Let's talk about our deployment and general strategy."

Taddeus Azaro

"It is indeed one of our options."

Player_Romus

"What would attacking from the north entail?"

Taddeus Azaro

"If we get Navar quickly, we can move towards Arces and cut out the supply of their whole army."

Player_Romus

"We can also focus on a naval invasion."

Player_Romus

"I think we shouldn't risk anything with a fake assault."

Lucita Azaro

"I'm afraid with our current capabilities, it is not possible to initiate a massive naval invasion."

Taddeus Azaro

"I suspect that to be the case as well, Your Majesty."

Narrator

The room fell into a silence as everybody looked at me in anticipation of what I would say next.

Taddeus Azaro

"Your Majesty. As the King, you have total control over our military strategy and the deployment of our troops."

Player_Romus

"What's the status of our military?"

Taddeus Azaro

"Our first objective is to take control of their cities Ziqes and Arces and trap their forces in at the chokepoint at Solles."

Player_Romus

"Give me the details of each front and what to expect."

Player_Romus

"I think I have enough information."

Player_Romus

"We will lead a direct assault without any precursors. It is better if they spread their defenses without a clear focus."

Player_Romus

"Before the invasion, we will feign an attack from the south and try to get their forces to focus there."

Narrator

The generals in the room gave me a military salute while shouting "Yes, sir."

Player_Romus

"I will look into it in detail, General."

Taddeus Azaro

"Our initial operation will be aimed at taking control of Arces and Ziqes."

Taddeus Azaro

"What are your initial orders, Your Majesty?"

Player_Romus

"Furthermore, we will keep our navy on standby until the assault begins. We cannot risk any reckless damage."

Player_Romus

"Furthermore, we will immediately focus our Navy to blockade the Gulf of Pales. Our efforts must be focused at their capital even if that means a direct confrontation with their strongest fleet."

Player_Romus

"Furthermore, we will immediately focus our Navy to blockade the Gulf of Remaz. Our efforts must be focused on disrupting their trade without a risky confrontation at the sea."

// FAILURE TO BLOCKADE PALES -- / -3 SHIP NEWS / REPORT

nan

// FAILURE TO BLOCKADE GULF OF ALES -- / -2 SHIP NEWS / REPORT

nan

// SUCCESSFUL BLOCKADE OF REMAZ NEWS / REPORT / ADD PENALTY TO REMAZ 

nan

// FAILURE TO BLOCKADE REMAZ -- / -1 SHIP NEWS / REPORT

nan

// DELIVERY OF LESPIAN TANKS CAPTURED

nan

Lucita Azaro

"Our admirals have reported that our specially trained marine divisions and their deployment ships will be ready to initiate a coastal invasion in no time."

Lucita Azaro

"It is also important to highlight that as much as we can contest Pales at the seas, they still have superior technology and numbers than us."

Taddeus Azaro

"Yes, Your Majesty. Thank you for your confidence."

Player_Romus

"No. We've been through this already."

Lucita Azaro

"Before we begin, a news from Grand Admiral..."

Lucita Azaro

"Unfortunately, the damages from the attack on our flagship Valero were worse than initially reported and the ship still remains out of service. We won't be able to use it in our invasion."

EnableToken("Rizia_Event_InvasionOfPales");\n\n// Enables token with the database name

nan
